00018 CGameLauncher::CGameLauncher() {
00019     m_mustquit      = false;
00020     m_hasbeenchosen = false;
00021     m_chosenGame    = 0;
00022     mp_LaunchMenu   = NULL;
00023     m_ep1slot       = -1; 
00024 }

00030 ////
00031 // Initialization Routine
00032 ////
00033 bool CGameLauncher::init()
00034 {
00035     bool gamedetected = false;
00036  
00037     // Initialize the menu
00038     mp_LaunchMenu = new CDialog(40, 25, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, DLG_THEME_RED);
00039  
00040     // Scan for games...
00041     m_DirList.clear();
00042     m_Entries.clear();
00043  
00044     g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Game Autodetection Started<br>" );
00045  
00046     // Process any custom labels
00047     getLabels();
00048  
00049     // Scan VFS DIR_ROOT for exe's
00050     if (scanExecutables(DIR_ROOT))
00051         gamedetected = true;
00052     // Recursivly scan into DIR_ROOT VFS subdir's for exe's
00053     if (scanSubDirectories(DIR_ROOT, DEPTH_MAX_ROOT))
00054         gamedetected = true;
00055  
00056     // Recursivly scan into DIR_GAMES subdir's for exe's
00057     if (scanSubDirectories(DIR_GAMES, DEPTH_MAX_GAMES))
00058         gamedetected = true;
00059 
00060     // Save any custom labels
00061     putLabels();
00062 
00063     // No games detected then quit
00064     mp_LaunchMenu->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT,1,m_Entries.size()+1, !gamedetected ? "No games found! - Quit" : "Quit");
00065  
00066     g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Game Autodetection Finished<br>" );
00067  
00068     return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 struct FileListAdder {
00072     void operator()(std::set<std::string>& dirs, const std::string& path) {
00073         std::string basepath = GetBaseFilename(path);
00074         if(basepath != "" && basepath[0] != '.') {
00075             dirs.insert(basepath);
00076         }
00077     }
00078 };
00079 
00080 bool CGameLauncher::scanSubDirectories(const std::string& path, size_t maxdepth)
00081 {
00082     bool gamedetected = false;
00083  
00084  std::set<std::string> dirs;
00085  FileListAdder fileListAdder;
00086  GetFileList(dirs, fileListAdder, path, false, FM_DIR);
00087  
00088  for(std::set<std::string>::iterator i = dirs.begin(); i != dirs.end(); ++i)
00089  {
00090   std::string newpath = path + '/' +  *i;
00091   
00092   if(scanExecutables(newpath))
00093    gamedetected = true;
00094   
00095   if(maxdepth > 1 && scanSubDirectories(newpath, maxdepth - 1))
00096    gamedetected = true;
00097  }
00098  
00099     return gamedetected;
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool CGameLauncher::scanExecutables(const std::string& path)
00103 {
00104     bool result = false;
00105  
00106     g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Search: %s<br>", path.c_str() );
00107  
00108  for(int i = 1; i <= 6; ++i) {
00109   CExeFile executable;
00110   // Load the exe into memory
00111   if(!executable.readData(i, path))
00112    continue;
00113     
00114   // Process the exe for type
00115   GameEntry newentry;
00116   newentry.crcpass = executable.getEXECrc();
00117   newentry.version = executable.getEXEVersion();
00118   newentry.episode = i;
00119   newentry.path    = path;
00120   newentry.exefilename = executable.getFileName();
00121   // Check for an existing custom label for the menu
00122   newentry.name    = scanLabels(executable.getFileName());
00123   
00124   std::string verstr;
00125   if(newentry.version<0) // Version couldn't be read!
00126    verstr = "unknown";
00127   else
00128    verstr = "v" + itoa(newentry.version/100) + "." + itoa(newentry.version%100);
00129   
00130   
00131   if( newentry.name.length() <= 0 )
00132   {
00133    newentry.name = "Episode: " + itoa(newentry.episode);
00134    newentry.name += " " + verstr + " " + newentry.path;
00135   }
00136   newentry.name += " ";
00137   
00138   // Save the type information about the exe
00139   m_Entries.push_back(newentry);
00140   // Add a new menu item
00141   mp_LaunchMenu->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, m_Entries.size(), newentry.name);
00142   
00143   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Detected game Name: %s Version: %d<br>", executable.getFileName().c_str()
00144         ,newentry.version );
00145   // The original episode 1 exe is needed to load gfx's for game launcher menu
00146   if ( m_ep1slot <= -1 && newentry.crcpass == true )
00147   {
00148    m_ep1slot = m_Entries.size()-1;
00149    g_pLogFile->ftextOut("   Using for in-game menu resources<br>" );
00150   }
00151   result = true;
00152  }
00153  
00154     return result;
00155 }

00157 ////
00158 // Process Routine
00159 ////
00160 void CGameLauncher::process()
00161 {
00162     // Gather input states
00163     if( g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_JUMP) || g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_STATUS) )
00164     {
00165         Uint8 selection = mp_LaunchMenu->getSelection();
00166         if( selection >= m_Entries.size() )
00167         {
00168             // outside the number of games, that exist. This means exit was triggered.
00169             m_mustquit = true;
00170         }
00171         else
00172         {
00173             m_hasbeenchosen = true;
00174             m_chosenGame = selection;
00175         }
00176     }
00177  
00178     // Did the user press (X)?
00179     if( g_pInput->getExitEvent() )
00180         m_mustquit = true;
00181  
00182     // Process Menu Input
00183     mp_LaunchMenu->processInput();
00184  
00185     // Draw the Start-Menu
00186     mp_LaunchMenu->draw();
00187 }
00188 
00189 void CGameLauncher::getLabels()
00190 {
00191     bool found;
00192     Uint16 i;
00193     std::string line, dir;
00194     std::ifstream gamescfg;
00195  
00196     m_Names.clear();
00197     m_Paths.clear();
00198  
00199     OpenGameFileR(gamescfg, GAMESCFG);
00200     if (gamescfg.is_open())
00201     {
00202         while ( !gamescfg.eof() )
00203         {
00204             getline(gamescfg,line);
00205    
00206             if (strncmp(line.c_str(),GAMESCFG_DIR,strlen(GAMESCFG_DIR)) == 0)
00207             {
00208                 dir = line.substr(strlen(GAMESCFG_DIR));
00209     
00210                 // Check for duplicates
00211                 found = false;
00212                 for ( i=0; i<m_Paths.size(); i++ )
00213                 {
00214                     if (strncmp(m_Paths.at(i).c_str(),dir.c_str(),dir.length()) == 0)
00215                     {
00216                         found = true;
00217                         break;
00218                     }
00219                 }
00220     
00221                 // If not a duplicate get the custom name
00222                 if (!found)
00223                 {
00224                     getline(gamescfg,line);
00225                     if (strncmp(line.c_str(),GAMESCFG_NAME,strlen(GAMESCFG_NAME)) == 0)
00226                     {
00227                         m_Paths.push_back( dir );
00228                         m_Names.push_back( line.substr(strlen(GAMESCFG_NAME)) );
00229                     }
00230                 }
00231             }
00232         }
00233         gamescfg.close();
00234     }
00235 }
00236 
00237 std::string CGameLauncher::scanLabels(const std::string& path)
00238 {
00239     Uint16 i;
00240  
00241     for ( i=0; i<m_Paths.size(); i++ )
00242     {
00243         if (strncmp(m_Paths.at(i).c_str(),path.c_str(),path.length()) == 0)
00244         {
00245             return m_Names.at(i);
00246         }
00247     }
00248     return "";
00249 }
00250 
00251 void CGameLauncher::putLabels()
00252 {
00253     Uint16 i;
00254     std::string line;
00255     std::ofstream gamescfg;
00256 
00257     OpenGameFileW(gamescfg, GAMESCFG);
00258     if (gamescfg.is_open())
00259     {
00260         for ( i=0; i<m_Entries.size(); i++ )
00261         {
00262             line = GAMESCFG_DIR + m_Entries.at(i).exefilename;
00263             gamescfg << line << std::endl;
00264             line = GAMESCFG_NAME + m_Entries.at(i).name;
00265             gamescfg << line << std::endl << std::endl;
00266         }
00267         gamescfg.close();
00268     }
00269 }

00275 void CGameLauncher::cleanup()
00276 { 
00277     // destroy the menu

00279 }
